recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients:
ground beef
onion
garlic
crushed tomatoes
spaghetti
recipes.instructions:
1. In a large skillet, brown ground beef over medium heat. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add diced onion and minced garlic to the skillet and sauté until softened.
3. Stir in crushed tomatoes and bring to a simmer.
4. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
5. Serve spaghetti topped with bolognese sauce.

recipes.title: Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients:
cooked rice
vegetable oil
onion
carrots
peas
eggs
soy sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add diced onion and diced carrots to the skillet and sauté until softened.
3. Stir in peas, scrambled eggs, and cooked rice.
4. Season with soy sauce to taste.
5. Cook until heated through and serve.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
all-purpose flour
baking powder
salt
sugar
milk
eggs
butter
recipes.instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
2. In a separate mixing bowl, beat eggs and milk together.
3. Stir the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients until just combined.
4. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
5. Using a ladle, pour batter onto the skillet.
6. Cook until bubbles appear on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
7. Serve with syrup.
